name: eyezero
description: EyeZero - Control your Mac with hand gestures via camera

scripts.build: npm run setup && npm run build:main && npm run build:renderer && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -r assets/* dist/assets/ && mkdir -p dist/renderer && cp src/renderer/*.html dist/renderer/ && cd dist/assets/mediapipe/tasks-vision/wasm && ln -sf vision_wasm_internal.js vision_wasm_nosimd_internal.js 2>/dev/null || cp vision_wasm_internal.js vision_wasm_nosimd_internal.js && ln -sf vision_wasm_internal.wasm vision_wasm_nosimd_internal.wasm 2>/dev/null || cp vision_wasm_internal.wasm vision_wasm_nosimd_internal.wasm

author: Mahmoud Ghonemi <https://github.com/maghonemi>

extendInfo.NSCameraUsageDescription: EyeZero needs camera access to track your hand gestures for mouse control.
extendInfo.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: EyeZero does not use the microphone, but macOS may request this permission.
